Also material doesn't iron well and leaves shiny spots unless you iron it inside out or use a sheet on top and the bust and sleeves can't be ironed well with a sheet on top or inside out as there is a inner layer of material that requires lower temperature iron on inside while outer layer requires hotter temperature than inner layer to iron. It has to be ironed as it comes wrinkled and wrinkles easily.  It comes with a separate belt that you can make into a bow.

评论详情: This dress was my Easter Sunday dress ! It was lightweight and colorful w/ useful pockets ! My baby niece spilled orange juice on it but it quickly dried …not a bad material but I probably will wear a petticoat next time to make it look fuller and have side shoulder area taken in by local tailor . I wear a size 0 or xs so if it was knit or stretchy fabric - it may fit mire snugly to me but the light fabric is good for wearing in 60-80 degree weather in Las Vegas !
